title: Gideon’s Final Victory and Downfall
summary: Judges 8 describes Gideon's pursuit of the Midianite kings and his eventual victory. Though Israel wants to make him king, Gideon refuses. However, he creates a gold ephod that becomes a snare for the people.

faq.question: Did Gideon become king?
faq.answer: No, he refused, saying God was Israel’s true king.

faq.question: What mistake did Gideon make after victory?
faq.answer: He made a golden ephod that the people began to worship.
